DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine incidence severity respiratory depression elective cesarean section patient receive spinal epidural narcotic call duramorph management postoperative pain . A monitoring device call capnograph well device call pulse oximeter place patient recovery room delivery . The capnograph monitor carbon dioxide level patient breathes well respiratory rate . The pulse oximeter device tap patient 's finger measure oxygen saturation level . The monitoring maintain 18-24 hour surgery .
DOC.criteria: Are female > = 18 year age < =55 year age ASA class IIII Schedule cesarean surgery Are willing able sign inform consent form study Are willing able follow instruction study protocol Have know contraindication/allergy neuraxial anesthesia morphine . Have ASA class > III Age > 55 year
